Sudokizer documentation

1.0

Sudokizer is an Edulix artifact

Introduction

This is the documention extracted from the very source code of this program. Sudokizer is a test program which resolves sudokus and it has been developed as an exercise where to put some developing knowledge into practicse, like the use of scons (a software construction tool), doxygen (a code documentation system), QTestLib (an unit test library), subversion (a control version system).
